title: Doctor Who: The Eighties
description: Here, for the first time, is a complete overview of the pivotal period that saw the apparent end of Doctor Who. The book reveals hitherto unknown facts about the actors, the technical crew, and the public reaction. In researching this book, the authors had unlimited access to the BBC's files and have turned up hundreds of new facts about the world's best-loved Time Lord.
author: David J. Howe
